tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    regulatory_category TEXT,
    marketing_practice TEXT,
    consumer_communication TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ConsumerCommunications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    consumer_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(100),
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Marketing_Materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    material_description TEXT,
    regulation_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES Marketing_Compliance_Regulations(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Consumer_Communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    communication_date DATE,
    material_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Marketing_Materials(material_id)
);
